CHO-R.BK.summary: Cho Thavee Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and assembles commercial automotive engineering systems. The company offers dump and 4 axles full trailers; refrigerated fiberglass body; dump, mobile lab, fiber refrigerator, and dry van trucks; and 3 axles and car carrier semi-trailers. It also provides ground support equipment, such as aircraft, maintanance platform, and 53 meter ladder trucks; semi-trailer 7 Axles; mobile advertising trucks; lowbed 3 axles and 16 axles semi-trailers; catering trucks; and rail systems, as well as project management services. It serves in Thailand, Hong Kong, Japan, Vietnam, Korea, Singapore, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Cho Thavee Dollasien Public Company Limited and changed its name to Cho Thavee Public Company Limited in May 2016. Cho Thavee Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Khon Kaen, Thailand.

KWM-R.BK.short_name: K. W. METAL WORK PUBLIC COMPANY
KWM-R.BK.long_name: K. W.  Metal Work Public Company Limited
KWM-R.BK.summary: K.W. Metal Work Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, manufactures and sells parts and accessories for farm machineries in Thailand. It offers screw presses and hi-tech machines, such as linear CNC and robotic welding machines. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KWM.BK.short_name: K. W. METAL WORK PUBLIC COMPANY
KWM.BK.long_name: K. W.  Metal Work Public Company Limited
KWM.BK.summary: K.W. Metal Work Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, manufactures and sells parts and accessories for farm machineries in Thailand. It offers screw presses and hi-tech machines, such as linear CNC and robotic welding machines. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TCJ-R.BK.summary: T.C.J. Asia Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, imports and distributes machinery and lifting equipment for construction work, and loading and unloading services in Thailand and internationally. It provides tractors, wheel loaders, road rollers, excavator, and cranes. The company also manufactures and distributes stainless steel pipes, as well as trades in stainless steel products. In addition, it is involved in the rental and repair of cranes and trucks; and installation works, as well as operates as a construction contractor. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

Asia Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, imports and distributes machinery and lifting equipment for construction work, and loading and unloading services in Thailand and internationally. It provides tractors, wheel loaders, road rollers, excavator, and cranes. The company also manufactures and distributes stainless steel pipes, as well as trades in stainless steel products. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

TMC-R.BK.summary: T.M.C. Industrial Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes hydraulic machinery and handling equipment in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Manufacture and Distribution of Machinery; Services; and Project Construction Service. The company offers hydraulic presses, including hydraulic clapper die spotting, hydraulic die spotting, hydraulic try out, hydraulic deep drawing, hydraulic hemming, hydraulic molding for hot, hydraulic trimming and bending, and hydraulic special presses, as well as provides automation machines for interior material. It also provides material handling equipment, such as hydraulic hand pallet trucks, table lifts, drum carrier trucks, X-lifts, stackers, hydraulic lift elevators, and dock levelers; and motorcycle lifters and full rise scissor lifts. In addition, the company offers automatic parking lifts, such as two post parking, two post tilt parking, scissor ranking, four post parking, four post double wide, three floors valet vertical parking level parking, three level parking, pit design parking, and rotatory parking lifts. Further, it provides mobile cranes, such as knuckle and telescoping boom cranes, and container lifts; hydraulic static pile drivers; presses mechanical and hydraulic isgec; special materials; and hydraulic cylinders and power units; and home elevators. Additionally, the company offers machine repair and maintenance, and metal machining services. T.M.C. Industrial Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.
